title: Unable to Find Teammates for Capstone Project
content:
Hey Guys!

I have been trying to reach out to many people. I am interested to do a Capstone Project under Blockchain Domain\[IOT Is also kind of okay. But I do not know shit about AI/ML. And I think that is overhyped\]

They either end up not replying or telling that they are already in a team.

**What happens if I am not able to find Teammates for the Capstone Project?**

I am scared tbh.

comments.body: Ask him how his day's going.
Everyone ends up in a team some way or the other. If you don't find anyone they will put you in one random team lol
Finding a good professor is probably the first thing u should do
